title: Chamki fever in Corona's havoc, first patient found in Bihar
content:
New Delhi. Right now, where Coronavirus has created panic all over the country, the knock of Chamki Fever has further increased the problem of people. Its first case has been reported in Muzaffarpur, Bihar. A child is said to have been admitted to the hospital due to chlamydia fever.

title: People of Tablagi Jamaat who were spitting deliberately, doctors also upset: Nizamuddin was taken for investigation
content: There has been a stir in the whole of Delhi since the arrival of 200 Muslims from the mosque located in Nizamuddin area of ​​Delhi. title: Stones pelted on doctors in Indore while tracking a man who came in contact with COVID-19 patient.
content:
Indore: Stones were pelted on a team of health officials while they were trying to trace a person who had come into contact with a COVID-19 patient earlier.
The incident occurred in Taat Patti Bakhal area when the team of five was trying to find out the whereabouts of the person.
